# Mini AI Project

This is a simple character-level Markov chain generator implemented in Python without using any external libraries like numpy, pandas, sklearn, torch, tensorflow, or requests.

## Features

- Implements a character-level Markov chain model for text generation.
- Includes a CLI for training the model and generating text from it.
- Contains unit tests to ensure the functionality of the code.

## Installation

1. Clone the repository:
   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/yourusername/mini_ai.git
   ```
2. Navigate to the project directory:
   ```bash
   cd mini_ai
   ```

## Usage

### Training the Model
```bash
python -m mini_ai.cli train --input your_text_file.txt
```

### Generating Text
```bash
python -m mini_ai.cli generate --model trained_model.pkl --length 100
```

## Tests
To run the tests, use:
```bash
pytest
```

This will execute all unit tests located in the `tests/` directory.
